metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13632 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ext/fts3/fts3_snippet.c in SQLite before 3.32.0 has a NULL pointer dereference via a crafted matchinfo() query.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.4
libsqlite3-0 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.4
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.4
sqlite3 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: jdstrand> full text search (FTS) not present in sqlite 2

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-1ubuntu0.4').
